name: Survival Deceit
description:
A "Metroidvania" game created for Metroidvania Month XIII. Also created as an exercise for me to review the game engine I will use for 6 months forward. This game is created in Godot Game Engine.

Every time you attack, you restore your ammo/MP. And every time you kill an enemy you restore 1 HP bar

Made the game in 15 days and I haven't fleshed out the story just yet.

Controls:

Arrow Keys = Move & Jump

Z = Attack

X = Interact

C = Change Weapons

Note: Art and Music are made by myself
